subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Price reached an agreement with Boston on a seven-year, $217 million deal that will be the richest for a pitcher in major league history, a person with knowledge of the negotiations said.
snippet: Price reached an agreement with Boston on a seven-year, $217 million deal that will be the richest for a pitcher in major league history, a person with knowledge of the negotiations said.
